title: Where What Now?
author: verias
text:
So, seems Theresa might have some issues with William going out like that to visit our world.

Who is taking votes on what might happen next, and how is William going to fit into our world if he's coming here?

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: He must be going to a convention, he'll fit right in with the cosplayers.
